allow: Bash(curl -s -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/maintenance.php?action=update" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""id"":""1"",""description"":""Updated routine maintenance check"",""estimated_duration"":""3.5"",""notes"":""Added some notes during editing""}")

Bash(curl -s -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/maintenance.php?action=update" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""id"":""4"",""priority"":""critical"",""estimated_cost"":""200.00"",""notes"":""Customer reported urgent issue with multiple keys not working""}")
